name: notesnook
description: Notesnook sync server provides secure, self-hosted synchronization support for Notesnook clients. It handles encrypted note syncing, device registration, and user accounts without third-party servers.
features: Encrypted sync: Synchronize notes across devices with end-to-end encryption for privacy.
Device registration: Manage which devices can access your notes with device authorization.
User accounts: Handle authentication and user management for Notesnook clients.
Cross-platform support: Sync notes between Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, and Android apps.
Self-hosted backend: Run your own sync server for complete control over note data.
Zero-knowledge architecture: Server cannot decrypt notes, ensuring only you can read your content.
Conflict resolution: Automatically handle sync conflicts when editing on multiple devices.
Backup support: Export encrypted backups for disaster recovery and data portability.
API compatibility: Works with official Notesnook clients without modification.
Secure storage: Notes stored with encryption at rest on your server infrastructure.
Subscription management: Handle user subscriptions and feature access for clients.
Privacy-focused: No telemetry or tracking, all data stays on your infrastructure.
